name: Gabi Stanovsky
content: gabrielstanovsky.github.io GabrielStanovsky CS faculty at the Hebrew University Follow I develop natural language processing models which deal with real-world texts and help answer multi-disciplinary research questions, e.g., in archaeology, law, medicine, and more. See my group, publications, and teaching pages for more details. I did my postdoc with Prof. Luke Zettlemoyer at the University of Washington and with Prof. Noah Smith at the Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence (AI2), my PhD at Bar-Ilan University’s NLP lab, with Prof. Ido Dagan, and my MSc thesis with Prof. Michael Elhadad, at the Ben Gurion University. Find my complete CV here. I’m also a wannabe movie buff, concert goer, book lover, and radio enthusiast. Want to talk with me? You can schedule a time here.
